name: Hargray
0:
”Alexa, ask Hargray to tune to the Weather Channel”
”Alexa, tell Hargray to watch channel 3”
”Alexa, ask Hargray to search for Big Bang Theory”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hargray
Developer Terms of Use
des: Alexa lets you control your Hargray tv receiver with just your voice. You can ask Alexa to tune to a channel by channel number, call letters or name (i.e. Weather Channel). You can tell Alexa to watch a currently-airing program by title. Alexa can search for program names, actors or directors, eliminating painstaking entry of letter-by-letter search terms.
